projects.name: This Website
projects.desc: This very website. Designed vertically and mobile-friendly, this website shows off my abilities and interests. Comes in all shades of green.

projects.name: The Resistance
projects.desc: Top-10 EngHack W2015 project. Helper mobile webapp to the party game 'The Resistance', eliminating confusing boards, cards, and counters.

projects.name: Match 3
projects.desc: Winning top-3 project at the Kik hackathon. Players enter an online game room using Kik and compete in real-time to find matching patterns of 3!

projects.name: Garden Guardian
projects.desc: A multiplayer, turn-based strategy game made solo at the Winter 2015 GI Jam. Players compete to grow, water, and cut trees on a shared land.

projects.name: UFO Game
projects.desc: An exprimental game made to learn Box2D. Players control a UFO in a randomly generated terrain, abducting various objects that respond to physics.

projects.name: Fiery Flight
projects.desc: A two player co-op game and winner of the Fall 2014 GI Jam Player's Choice Award. Players use a mouse and keyboard and try to chase their fiery predator!
